author: wrowe
msg: Ugly hack gone... now need some new goodies

author: rbb
msg: Always build expat.  This can probably be removed if we are told to look
for expat some place else.  For now, this gets Apache building again on

author: wrowe
msg: As the design decision has been made not to export the xml engine hiding
within Apache, the xml.dsp/.mak files create a private static library
to be bound into aprutil.lib and libaprutil.dll.  Nothing is exported.
There seems no good sense in adding more load time to bring in two dlls
(libaprutil/libexpat) so this is a more effective solution.
